mapper.insert: insert into w_scrape (no, p_no, id) values (w_scrape_no_seq.nextval, #{pNo}, #{id})
mapper.select: select s.no as no, s.p_no as pNo, s.id as id, p.f_save_name as fSaveName, p.main as main, pr.p_name as pName, pr.category as category from w_scrape s, w_picture p, w_product pr where id = #{ id } and s.p_no = p.p_no and s.p_no = pr.p_no and p.main = '1'
